description: This file defines and initializes SlackTools and an Agent to interact with Slack, providing example responses for messaging, listing channels, and retrieving message history.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using provided tools.

classes.name: SlackTools
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with Slack.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of Agent to print a response message, optionally formatted with markdown.
